title: Install an OTA Android 12 DP and get the error on a Pixel 3 locked Bootloader from verizon,
content:
Hi.
I tried to install an OTA of Android 12 DP on my pixel 3 and when it reboots it stuck in fastboot with the error Cant find valid operating system.
Since is a verizon pixel 3 it has the bootloader locked, so no luck with your online service for reinstalling de operating system.
The phone has a google account hamitllerena@gmail.com, if you need the password i can provide it.
Please iam from Cuba so i wish i can go to a google certified service to fix my phone, but for me its impossible.
thanx in advance.
Hamit
